main event: Two Miami pilots reported seeing four shiny unidentified flying objects near Bragg Air Force Base in North Carolina on October 15, 1950.
interesting points: The pilots described the objects as shiny and estimated them to be about 100 feet in diameter,The objects appeared to be moving quickly and changed direction rapidly,One pilot mentioned a previous sighting of similar objects like 'balloons',The sighting was reported to the Civil Aeronautics Administration,The report notes the possibility that these may be the same objects pursued by another pilot in the area.
witness description: Miami pilots Capt. George W. Woodward and Co-Pilot Williams
